sentences: Per Lasson (April 18, 1859 — June 6, 1883) was a Norwegian composer.
He was the son of barrister Christian Lasson (1830–93) and Alexandra Cathrine Henriette von Munthe af Morgenstierne (1838–81).
His sisters included  painter Oda Krohg (1860–1935) and cabaret singer  Bokken Lasson (1871–1970).
